name: Counseling
description: The SF Rent Board provides counseling information about subjects written in the Rent Ordinance. Counselors are available for: - 5 minutes over the phone - 10 minutes in person at the Rent Board's office NOTE: The Rent Board staff cannot give legal advice. You will be notified if your question should be properly answered by a lawyer. How to Apply: - Please write down your questions before you speak with a counselor. - To speak with a counselor: - Call 415-252-4600 during their phone hours OR - Vi
